article.title: U.S. Defense Department to Build Network Control Center in Qatar
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: FNG-PAT Joint Venture, LLC, Detroit, Michigan, was awarded a $9,912,567 firm-fixed-price contract for the construction of a theater communications facility and network control center at Al Udeid Air Base, Qatar.Â The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Winchester, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
